title: Autumn Secrets
description: SPECIAL HALLOWEEN RELEASE! Summer is over and autumn brings secrets to the surface! New vampire in town, Christopher Arano, is trying to find a local girl to date when evil legend Sven Ermore returns to haunt Mystic Evermore. The Lenore family continue to mourn the death of Lenaâ€™s parents, and the community experience a truly magical Halloween night.
author: Cecelia Hopkins-Drewer
